news.title: Cable companies Charter and Cox agree to merge
news.summary: Charter Communications and Cox Communications, two of the largest cable companies in the U.S., have entered into an agreement to merge. The deal is expected to be completed by the end of the year.

news.title: How much would a 100% 'Made in the USA' vehicle cost? It's complicated
news.summary: President Donald Trump wants automakers to build more vehicles in the U.S. with American parts. It's not as easy as it might seem.

news.title: Novo Nordisk CEO to step down as Wegovy maker faces growing competition
news.summary: Fruergaard Jørgensen will remain in his post "for a period to support a smooth transition to new leadership," Danish pharmaceutical giant says.

news.title: Fortnite is now offline on iOS worldwide as Apple blocks game, Epic Games says
news.summary: Fortnite is now unavailable on iOS globally, Epic Games said Friday. Apple blocked a bid to reinstate the popular game on the App Store in the U.S.

news.title: Mike Novogratz describes 'unfair, infuriating' path to Galaxy Digital's Nasdaq listing
news.summary: Mike Novogratz’s Galaxy Digital will finally list on the Nasdaq. The move marks a hard-fought victory for the crypto mogul.

news.title: Virgin Galactic’s stock is skyrocketing. This is why.
news.summary: Virgin Galactic expects that private astronauts will pay more than $600,000 for a ticket on its new Delta class SpaceShips. Space-tourism company Virgin Galactic expects  private astronauts to pay more Than $600k for a Tickets on its New Delta Class SpaceShip.

news.title: How Europe’s best investor picks stocks including GE Aerospace and Microsoft
news.summary: Chris Hohn is knighted in the U.K. and founder of The Children’s Investment Fund. He was called the best investor Europe has ever had by Nicolai Tangen, head of Norway's sovereign wealth fund.

news.title: My second wife says her 2 kids should inherit our estate, but I also have 2 kids. Is that fair?
news.summary: “I will leave the $1 million inheritance I received from my parents to my biological daughters,” he said. “I’ll leave it to my children.”

news.title: Bank of America says conditions are emerging for these unloved stocks to thrive.
news.summary: Bank of America: Emerging markets are the next hot spot for investors. Here’s why it says they’re a good place to start.

news.title: Home builders and buyers face bleak picture in the spring. Weak housing starts illustrate why.
news.summary: For the third year in a row the picture in the housing market is bleak. Spring is usually the time when construction companies build more homes in anticipation of rising sales.
